sentences: Leon Bolier (Dutch pronunciation: [ˈleːjɔn boːˈliːr]; born Leendert Wouter Bolier; 21 October 1980), also known by his mononym Bolier, is a Dutch trance composer, DJ, and record producer.

He has had his songs played by top DJs like Tiësto and Armin van Buuren as well as his tracks appearing on famous trance compilations such as In Search of Sunrise 4: Latin America and A State of Trance 2006.
At the end of 2014, Leon started working on his third album under his new alias WSTLNDR.
2017: "Imagine" (with Arem Ozguc and Arman Aydin featuring NBLM)
2016: "Is This Love" (with Bob Marley and Lvndscape)
2015: "Every Single Piece" (with Redondo featuring She Keeps Bees)
2008: "Hold On" (with Joop and featuring Denise Rivera)
2006: "No Need To Come Back" (featuring Elsa Hill)
Olav Basoski featuring Spyder - Waterman 2017 (Bolier Remix)
2013: Mark Van Dale with Enrico - Water Verve (Leon Bolier Remix)
RMB featuring Talla 2XLC - Spring (Leon Bolier Remix)
2007: Kenneth Thomas - Soleil Noir (Leon Bolier Remix)
Gott and Gordon - Midnight (Leon Bolier Remix)
2005: Niklas Harding and Redshift - Pagoda (Leon Bolier Remix)
